system.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by a Status-Category attack.

Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit, and additional Status-Category attacks targeting the user also fail to hit until the user's next Activation, or when the round ends, whichever is first. Attacks failing to hit do not activate on-miss effects.
